Quote argument as a string.

Source: R/qae.R
qs.Rd

qs() uses bquote() .() quasiquotation escaping notation.

qs(s)

Arguments

s

expression to be quoted as a string.

Value

character

Examples


x <- 7

qs(a == x)

#> a == x

qs(a == .(x))

#> a == 7
